quote: There were at least four contexts in which San shamans acquired insights into the spiritual world: – the trance dance, – special curing rituals, – viewing rock art, and – dreams.
quote_letters: THERE WERE AT LEAST FOUR CONTEXTS IN WHICH SAN SHAMANS ACQUIRED INSIGHTS INTO THE SPIRITUAL WORLD - THE TRANCE DANCE - SPECIAL CURING RITUALS - VIEWING ROCK ART AND - DREAMS
